title: Covid-19 Restrictions
body:
Please note that the return to sailing guidelines have been revised to permit restricted use of the changing rooms.  Members wishing to enter the clubhouse must wear a face covering and abide by the published guideline.

The revised SSSC Guidelines can be accessed via the following link[ (Click Here)](https://www.myclubhouse.co.uk/SSSC/Client/Documents/sssc_guideline_-_return_to_sailing.pdf).\
\
We request that anyone who may have cold/flu symptoms, been advised to self-isolate, or are considered to be within the high risk group to stay at home and not visit the club in accordance with government guidelines.\
\
We hope you are all keeping well, and hope to see you on the water very soon.

Stay safe
description: The SSSC return to sailing guidelines have been revised.
